mosaic.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a pattern or picture made by fitting together small pieces of coloured stone, glass etc
mosaic.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: rooms decorated with wall paintings and mosaics
mosaic.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a group of different things that exist next to each other or together
mosaic.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: The forest floor was a mosaic of autumn colours.
the complex mosaic of world cultures
mosaic.translation[1].definitions[0].def: relating to Moses, the great leader of the Jewish people in ancient times
